programme.title: The Town

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: On an autumn night in 2003, Harvard undergrad and computer programming genius Mark Zuckerberg sits down at his computer and heatedly begins working on a new idea. In a fury of blogging and programming, what begins in his dorm room soon becomes a global social network and a revolution in communication. A mere six years and 500 million friends later, Mark Zuckerberg is the youngest billionaire in history, but for this entrepreneur, success leads to both personal and legal complications.

programme.desc: The famous symbologist Robert Langdon wakes up in an Italian hospital with amnesia and finds himself the target of a manhunt. Together, they race across Europe and against the clock to stop a virus that would wipe out half of the world's population.

programme.title: Seven Years in Tibet
programme.desc: The true story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet. Based on the book Seven Years in Tibet written by Austrian mountaineer Heinrich Harrer on his experiences in Tibet between 1944 and 1951 during the Second World War. The score was composed by John Williams.

Through a series of comic adventures with Tip, Oh comes to understand that being different and making mistakes is all part of being human. And while he changes her planet and she changes his world, they discover the true meaning of the word home.

programme.title: Wallace & Gromit: Curse Of Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: Wallace and Gromit's latest enterprise is Anti-Pesto, pest control with a heart. When called upon by the dotty Lady Tottington to solve her rabbit infestation, Wallace tangles with her Ladyship's would-be suitor, rotten cad Victor Quartermaine. At first Wallace and Gromit seem to have things in hand. But Wallace's mind transference device malfunctions, and he's in danger of being bagged by Quartermaine. Wallace teeters perilously close to disaster and his four-legged pal, Gromit, faces almost insurmountable odds to save the day!

programme.title: Mr Inbetween
programme.desc: Ray's work and personal life begin to collide, and he finds himself struggling to keep both sides of his life from imploding.

programme.title: Mr Inbetween
programme.desc: We meet our anti-hero Ray, as well as his daughter, Brittany, ex-wife, Jacinta, unwell brother, Bruce, best friend, Gary, and boss, Freddy. Freddy owes Ray money which he doesn't have, as usual so he sends Ray off with newly hired heavy, Nick, to collect and keep a 10k debt. Nick hasn't collected before and proves ineffective, so Ray has to step in and do it his way to get results. Ray meets Ally at the dog park and there is immediate chemistry - but he doesn't act on it, feeling that she's out of his league. Gary is in trouble with his Russian wife, Tatiana, over the discovery of a porn DVD and asks Ray to take the blame. While out with Brittany having ice-cream they bump into some young men who knock her ice-cream to the ground and disrespect Ray. Ray assaults one of the young men responsible and while escaping the scene he runs into Ally and takes the opportunity to make his feelings a little clearer. Ally gives Ray her number.

programme.title: Mr Inbetween
programme.desc: Ray and Ally get caught out, and good dental hygiene is as important as paying your debts.

programme.desc: We meet our anti-hero Ray, as well as his daughter, Brittany, ex-wife, Jacinta, unwell brother, Bruce, best friend, Gary, and boss, Freddy. Freddy owes Ray money which he doesn't have, as usual so he sends Ray off with newly hired heavy, Nick, to collect and keep a 10k debt. Nick hasn't collected before and proves ineffective, so Ray has to step in and do it his way to get results. Ray meets Ally at the dog park and there is immediate chemistry - but he doesn't act on it, feeling that she's out of his league. Gary is in trouble with his Russian wife, Tatiana, over the discovery of a porn DVD and asks Ray to take the blame. While out with Brittany having ice-cream they bump into some young men who knock her ice-cream to the ground and disrespect Ray. programme.title: Love Happens
programme.desc: A grieving self-help guru and a recently single florist's lives come crashing together at exactly the wrong time. Does love stand a chance?

programme.title: The First Wives Club
programme.desc: Join Diane Keaton, Bette Midler and Goldie Hawn in this sinfully satisfying revenge romp about a trio of first wives who team up to teach their lying, cheating ex-husbands a lesson. Ivana Trump's galvanising cameo - 'don't get mad, dahlinks, get everytink' - sets the scene in a comedy that hinges on the self-mockery of its ageless stars. Midler's ball-busting shtick, Keaton's ditsy vulnerability and Hawn's eternal youth are just light-hearted grist for the mill of female friendship as a serious source of strength.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After breaking up with Mark Darcy, Bridget Jones's "happily ever after" hasn't quite gone according to plan. Fortysomething and single again, she decides to focus on her job as top news producer and surround herself with old friends and new. For once, Bridget has everything completely under control. What could possibly go wrong? Then her love life takes a turn and Bridget meets a dashing American named Jack, the suitor who is everything Mr. Darcy is not. In an unlikely twist she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch she can only be fifty percent sure of the identity of her baby's father.

programme.title: Made of Honour
programme.desc: Tom is sexy, successful, has great luck with the ladies, and knows he can always rely on Hannah, his delightful best friend and the one constant in his life. It's the perfect set-up, until Hannah goes overseas to Scotland on a six-week business trip and Tom is stunned to realise how empty his life is without her. He resolves that when she gets back, he'll ask Hannah to marry him, but his plans go awry when he learns that she has become engaged to a handsome and wealthy Scotsman. When Hannah asks Tom to be her maid of honour, he reluctantly agrees to fill the role, but only so he can attempt to woo Hannah and stop the wedding before it's too late.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: Two Manhattanites plot against each other in a cross-purpose love affair that is meant to be over in 10 days, but might just last a lifetime. In a screwball set-up involving a writer who goes undercover to demonstrate how women routinely put men off by crashing their poker-nights and letting our poodles pee on their pool tables, her sitting duck is a hotshot adman on a bet to demonstrate what men can do to make women fall for them in a matter of 10 days or so.

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: Ben Finn Finnegan is an affable, modern-day treasure hunter who is obsessed with finding the legendary 18th century Queens Dowry 40 chests of priceless treasure that was lost at sea in 1715. In his quest, Finn has sunk everything he has, including his marriage to Tess Finnegan. Just as Tess has begun to rebuild her life, working aboard a mega-yacht owned by billionaire Nigel Honeycutt, Finn discovers a vital clue to the treasures whereabouts. Much to Tess' consternation, Finn manoeuvres himself aboard Nigel's yacht and, using his roguish charm, convinces the tycoon and his daughter, Gemma, to join him in the pursuit of the Spanish treasure. But they are not the only ones after the prize. Finn's one-time mentor, Moe Fitch, and a ruthless local gangster are intent on beating Finn to the prize. Let the treasure hunt begin.

When Hannah asks Tom to be her maid of honour, he reluctantly agrees to fill the role, but only so he can attempt to woo Hannah and stop the wedding before it's too late.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: Two Manhattanites plot against each other in a cross-purpose love affair that is meant to be over in 10 days, but might just last a lifetime. In a screwball set-up involving a writer who goes undercover to demonstrate how women routinely put men off by crashing their poker-nights and letting our poodles pee on their pool tables, her sitting duck is a hotshot adman on a bet to demonstrate what men can do to make women fall for them in a matter of 10 days or so.

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: Ben Finn Finnegan is an affable, modern-day treasure hunter who is obsessed with finding the legendary 18th century Queens Dowry 40 chests of priceless treasure that was lost at sea in 1715. In his quest, Finn has sunk everything he has, including his marriage to Tess Finnegan. Just as Tess has begun to rebuild her life, working aboard a mega-yacht owned by billionaire Nigel Honeycutt, Finn discovers a vital clue to the treasures whereabouts. Much to Tess' consternation, Finn manoeuvres himself aboard Nigel's yacht and, using his roguish charm, convinces the tycoon and his daughter, Gemma, to join him in the pursuit of the Spanish treasure. But they are not the only ones after the prize. Finn's one-time mentor, Moe Fitch, and a ruthless local gangster are intent on beating Finn to the prize. Let the treasure hunt begin.

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: Anna, the world's most famous movie star, and William, a stagnant business owner, cross paths and fall in love. But can two people fall in love with the whole world watching?

programme.title: Ladies in Black
programme.desc: Adapted from the bestselling novel by Madeleine St John, Ladies In Black is an alluring and tender-hearted comedy drama about the lives of a group of department store employees in 1959 Sydney.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father dies, four grown siblings, bruised and banged up by their respective adult lives, are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof together for a week.

programme.title: Leatherheads
programme.desc: Dodge Connelly, captain of a struggling squad of barroom brawlers, has only one hope to save his team: recruit college superstar Carter Rutherford. But when a feisty reporter starts snooping around, she turns the two teammates into instant rivals and kicks off a wild competition filled with hilarious screwball antics.

programme.title: Intolerable Cruelty
programme.desc: A hilarious romantic comedy about men, women, and everything that can go wrong between them. Sparks fly when brilliant divorce attorney Miles Massey meets his match in the beautiful but ruthless Marylin Rexroth.

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: A bank robber escaping jail finds himself stealing something more precious than money - a Federal Marshall's heart - risking it all to find out if there's more between them than just the law.

programme.title: Kate & Leopold
programme.desc: Kate McKay is a modern female executive in New York City whose drive to succeed in the cutthroat corporate world has left little time for romance. When her genius ex-boyfriend discovers a portal to travel through time, and brings back a 19th-century nobleman named Leopold to prove it, a sceptical Kate reluctantly takes responsibility for showing Leopold the 21st century.

programme.title: Monster-In-Law
programme.desc: After years of looking for Mr Right, Charlotte 'Charlie' Cantilini finally finds the man of her dreams only to discover that his mother, Viola, is the woman of her nightmares. A recently-fired national news anchor who is afraid she will lose her son the way she has just lost her career, Viola does everything she can to scare off her son's new fiance by becoming the world's worst mother-in-law. While Viola's long-time assistant Ruby does her best to help Viola execute her crazy schemes, Charlie decides to fight back and the gloves come off as the women battle it out to see just who the alpha-female is.

programme.title: Past Lives
programme.desc: Korea. Childhood friends Nora and Hae Sung are torn apart after Nora's family emigrates from South Korea. Two decades later, they reunite in New York for one fateful week as they confront notions of destiny, love, and the choices that make a life.

programme.title: Far from Heaven
programme.desc: A seductive story about a seemingly perfect family, and the forbidden desires that threaten to tear them apart. Cathy Whitaker has it all - a lovely home, two wonderful children and a handsome husband, who is successfully climbing the corporate ladder. But Cathy's idyllic existence is just an illusion, and she is eventually forced to choose between living a lie or following her heart.

programme.title: Emma.
programme.desc: Jane Austen's beloved comedy about finding your equal and earning your happy ending is reimagined in this delicious film adaptation.

programme.title: Tad And The Secret Of King Midas
programme.desc: Tad dreams of becoming an archaeologist traveling the world, uncovering hidden secrets and lost treasure, but his job working construction keeps him daydreaming instead of exploring. The chance of a lifetime comes when he is invited to attend archaeologist Sara Loavrof's presentation of her latest discovery, the papyrus that proves the existence of the Necklace of Midas, the legendary King who turned everything he touched into solid gold. When an evil billionaire forces Sara to help him find the enchanted talisman, Tad must rescue the girl of his dreams on a trip around the world, in this new hilarious, action-packed adventure the whole family will love!

Now, with hundreds of cases solved and adventures shared, Scooby and the gang face their biggest, most challenging mystery ever, a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. As they race to stop this global "dogpocalypse", the gang discovers that Scooby has a secret legacy and an epic destiny greater than anyone imagined.

programme.desc: Seven-year-old Tim Templeton suddenly finds his share of parental love plummeting when his new baby brother arrives - wearing a suit and toting a briefcase - and makes it clear to everyone that he's in charge. programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: In this hilarious animated adventure comedy, you'll finally find out why the birds are so angry. In an island paradise populated entirely by happy, flightless birds - or almost entirely, Red, a bird with a temper problem, speedy Chuck, and the volatile Bomb have always been outsiders. But when the island is visited by mysterious green piggies, it's up to these unlikely outcasts to figure out what the pigs are up to.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: In the brand new adventure Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle, the tables are turned as four teenagers are sucked into the world of Jumanji. When four high-school kids discover an old video game console with a game they've never heard of Jumanji they are immediately drawn into the game's jungle setting, literally becoming the avatars they chose: gamer Spencer becomes a brawny adventurer; football jock Fridge loses (in his words) 'the top two feet of his body' and becomes an Einstein; popular girl Bethany becomes a middle-aged male professor; and wallflower Martha becomes a badass warrior. What they discover is that you don't just play Jumanji you must survive it. To beat the game and return to the real world, they'll have to go on the most dangerous adventure of their lives, discover what Alan Parrish left 20 years ago, and change the way they think about themselves or they'll be stuck in the game forever.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Dr Sherman Klump, a kind, calorically challenged genetics professor who longs to shed his 400-pound frame in order to win the heart of the beautiful Carla Purty. Can Sherman stop his buff alter ego before it's too late, or will Buddy have the last laugh?

programme.desc: Fed up with answering to higher-ups, Nick, Kurt and Dale decide to become their own bosses and launch their own business. Soon, though, a slick investor pulls the rug out from under them. Outplayed and desperate, and with no legal recourse, the three would-be entrepreneurs hatch a misguided plan to kidnap the investor's adult son and ransom him to regain control of their company.

programme.desc: A harried workaholic who is given a universal remote that allows him to pause, rewind or skip portions of his life in this fast, and out-of-control comedy adventure.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A fast talking con-artist and a conservative bank teller are teamed up to travel south on a bootlegging run for some quick cash, becoming the funniest odd couple east of the Mississippi.

programme.title: Bad News Bears
programme.desc: Grizzled former professional baseball player Morris Buttermaker is recruited by a strait-laced lawyer to coach the Bears, a woefully inept Little League team.

programme.title: Mr. Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean can't believe his luck when he wins a camcorder and an all-expense paid holiday to the French Riviera. But during his journey to the south, he falls face first into a series of mishaps.

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: The accidental secret agent returns, sent on a mission to stop a group of international assassins before they eliminate a Chinese leader and cause global chaos.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, Sonny Koufax is a carefree slob trying to save his love life by becoming responsible. He gets the chance when a cute kid turns up needing a father.

programme.title: Meet the Fockers
programme.desc: Domestic disaster looms for nurse Greg Focker when his straight-laced, ex-CIA father-in-law, Jack Byrnes, asks to meet his parents before the wedding.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: Beca is that girl who'd rather listen to what's coming out of her headphones than what's coming out of you. Arriving at her new college, she finds herself not right for any clique but somehow is muscled into one that she never would have picked on her own: alongside mean girls, sweet girls and weird girls whose only thing in common is how good they sound when they sing together, in the out-loud comedy Pitch Perfect. When Beca takes this acoustic singing group out of their world of traditional arrangements and perfect harmonies into all-new mash-ups, they fight to climb their way to the top of the cutthroat world of college a cappella. This could wind up either the coolest thing they'll ever do or the most insane, and it will probably be a little of both.

programme.title: Fun With Dick And Jane (2005)
programme.desc: A couple who lose their minds whilst trying to hold onto the elusive American dream, turn to crime to get back in the black and outwit a greedy, corporate executive.

programme.title: Jack and Jill
programme.desc: Jack Sadelste is a successful advertising executive in LA with a gorgeous wife and kids, who dreads one event each year; the arrival of his identical twin sister Jill. Jill's neediness and passive-aggressive behaviour is maddening to Jack, turning his normally tranquil life upside down. Jack's circumstances spin more out of control when Jill decides to stay and he doesn't believe she'll ever leave.

programme.title: Meet the Fockers

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Armed with proton packs and a new range of kick-ass weapons, the Ghostbusters battle to save the city from an uprising of mischievous ghouls.

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: What happens when two fumbling FBI agents disguise themselves as mega-rich princesses to infiltrate high society? It's frantic antics and nonstop hilarity with a side-splitting disco dance-off.

programme.title: Scary Movie
programme.desc: In this send-up of the most popular horror movies, a familiar-looking group of teenagers find themselves being stalked by a more-than-vaguely recognisable masked killer.

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: When Satan reneges on his plans to retire, two of his three heirs leave Hell for New York City to gather enough souls to vote the Prince of Darkness out of office. But Satan sends his youngest and nicest son, Little Nicky, to bring his two treacherous brothers home.

programme.desc: An apocalyptic zombie uprising gives Shaun and his mates a night from hell when they meet at the local pub and find themselves fighting off hordes of the brain-hungry undead in this horror comedy.

programme.title: Meet the Parents
programme.desc: Male nurse Greg Focker is poised to propose to his girlfriend Pam during a weekend stay at her parents' home. But here's the catch he needs to ask her father first. Alas, the fur flies as Jack Byrnes, Pam's cat-crazy, ex-CIA father takes an immediate dislike to her less-than-truthful beau. Greg's quest for approval gets seriously side-tracked as Murphy's Law takes over and a hilarious string of mishaps turns him into a master of disaster and total pariah in the eyes of the entire family, all except for his shell-shocked girlfriend, who can't believe she still lovers her one-man wrecking crew.

programme.desc: Five best friends from college reunite 10 years later for a wild bachelorette weekend in Miami. Their partying takes a dark turn when they accidentally kill a male stripper.

programme.desc: When they make a three-hour sex tape to spice up their love life, a husband and wife realise they're in trouble when the epic recording threatens to go viral! A delightfully crude comedy.

programme.title: Did You Hear About the Morgans?
programme.desc: A delightful comedy about finding love in the most unexpected places. Two successful New Yorkers, Paul and Meryl, are at their wits' end with repairing their strained marriage. But when they become the only witnesses to a brutal murder, the police hide them away in Wyoming, together. Now these die-hard city dwellers will have to survive the weather, bears, fresh air, and forced time with one another if they want to make it out alive.

programme.title: Johnny English Strikes Again
programme.desc: The new adventure begins when a cyber-attack reveals the identity of all active undercover agents in Britain, leaving Johnny English as the secret service's last hope. Called out of retirement, English dives head first into action with the mission to find the mastermind hacker. As a man with few skills and analogue methods, Johnny English must overcome the challenges of modern technology to make this mission a success.

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: A pair of energy drink salesmen are forced into the role of big brothers to fulfil a community service obligation. But what at first seems like an easy way to do their time quickly becomes a pint-sized hassle when the kids they are assigned to mentor become a bigger challenge than they expected.

programme.desc: When he is ruled to be property and not a person, a foul-mouthed teddy bear seeks the aid of a legendary civil rights attorney to gain the justice he deserves.
